conclusion_1:
We have successfully convinced new followers to join our cult !
They may not be ideal yet, but they will soon be !
You have gained 10 cultists
conclusion_2:
We've managed to brainwash 10 of these idiots to become our loyal followers ! We're not so sure how stable their mental condition is, they could maybe still try to rebel.
You gain 10 cultists, but lose 10% loyalty.
conclusion_3:
The kidnapping raid was a success ! I would advise you to use our prisoners quickly, they are draining our ressources.
You gain 20 prisoners.
event_text:
Master,
a bunch of hippies have decided to gather around and protest for legalizing a new drug. This sounds like a perfect opportunity to bring some of them to our cause, either by convincing them, or by using force. We could also just kidnap them instead of convincing them.
option 1: costs 2000$ and send 2 cultists
option 2: costs 200 magic and send 2 cultists
option 3: costs 500$ and send 10 cultists

conclusion_1:
Your cultists have managed to convert some prisoners to the cause.
You gain 3 cultists
conclusion_2:
You have succesfully turned your prisoners into soup ! Your culstists are very happy and said it was delicious.
Gain 5% loyalty and an extra 300$.
conclusion_3: You decide to let the prisoners alone.
event_text:
Great one,
We have too many prisoners, we need to deal with them. We can try and convert them or we could turn them into soup.
option 1: costs 100 magic and send 5 cultists
option 2: gain 300$ and send 2 cultists
option 3: Do nothing

conclusion_1:
Your infiltration of the highschool was a success ! You've managed to sneak in your brainwashing program through a roleplaying game at the school, gaining followers as well as having gained a considerable amount of magic from the rituals made at the school.
 Gain 3000 magic, 15 cultists, 10& loyalty, 2 prisoners and 200$.
conclusion_2:
Your operation was somewhat successful, you've managed to acquire some followers and gained some magic from the rituals at the school. However, your operation was caught and your servants needed to run away.
 Gain 500 magic, 2 cultist, but lose 500$
conclusion_3:
You've managed to kidnap three high schoolers, but you've had to spend some ressources to hide your trails from the police.
 You lose 1000$
event_text:
My lord,
We have in informat inside the local high school. We can try and use this to influence the young minds of the students to make sacrifices to you, it could take some time. We could also just kidnap some of them.
option 1: costs 500 magic and send 5 cultists
option 2: costs 100 magic and send 2 cultists
option 3: gain 3 prisoners

conclusion_1:
You've convinced a candidate to vouch for your cult.
 You gain 4 cultists, 300 magic and 3 prisoners.
conclusion_2:
You have won the elections ! Congratulations, you will now influence the whole town into slowly giving you everything you want.
 You gain a permanent intake of 2 cultists, 500 magic and 1000$ every 20 seconds.
conclusion_3:
Your cultists have managed to set terror at a rally event and kidnap some of the attendees. You've set fear in the hearts of the locals.
Gain 5 prisoners.
event_text:
Great one,
the next local elections are coming and the candidates are already campaining. We should try to influence the elections in our favour. We could corrupt a candidate to bring to bring people to our cause, we could try and win the elections, or we could just try to sabotage them.
option 1: lose 150 magic, 1000$ and send 2 cultists
option 2: lose 10 000$, 500 magic and send 20 cultists
 option 3: send 2 cultists

conclusion_1:
You manage to convert their leader and their following stop harassing you.
Gain 1 cultist.
conclusion_2:
You've brought about chaos to the church's place of worship and mayhem ensued.
Gain 5% loyalty, 6 prisoners and 1000$.
conclusion_3:
You've enhanced your public image through propaganda campaigns that were sucessful and have convinced many of the common folk that you are benevolant.
 Gain 4 cultists, 200 magic and 8% loyalty
event_text:
My lord,
the nearby church has decided to do something against us and has been harassing some of our members, we need to fight back. We could go their sacred place of worship and brainwash their leader, we could also try to cause chaos in their mist, or we could also try to better our public image.
option 1: lose 100 magic and send 2 cultists
option 2: lose 300 magic and send 3 cultists
option 3: lose 3500$

conclusion_1:
You sacrifice all the traitors in the ritual.
You gain a further 250 magic.
conclusion_2:
You decided to make some of them into soup and some of them to be kept in their cages.
You gain 3 prisoners and 500$.
conclusion_3:
You decided not to address the issue.
 Youlose 10% loyalty.
event_text:
Grand one,
 We have traitors among us, it is time for us to make a purge. Only the loyal ones will stay. We could try and put some effort into finding out who the traitors are, we would then need to know how to deal with them. We can either sacrifice them for our rituals or simply keep them around to give an example.
 option 1: gain 250 magic
option 2: lose 500 magic
option 3: do nothing
